channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 埃克森公司首席执行官达伦-伍兹（Darren Woods）在其七年任期的前半部分受到了环保人士和投资者的攻击，现在他开始采取攻势，华尔街对他更大胆的立场表示赞赏。
item.description:
Exxon CEO Darren Woods is going on the offensive after coming under attack from environmentalists and investors in the first half of his seven-year tenure -- and Wall Street is rewarding his bolder stance. https://t.co/2RRJXvay7c

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 波兰农民开始封锁德国边境附近的一条重要公路，抗议从乌克兰进口粮食和欧盟有关农业的气候倡议
item.description:
Polish farmers started blocking a key highway near the German border to protest against food imports from Ukraine and the European Union’s climate initiatives regarding agriculture https://t.co/duhYBIZKAm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 欧盟承诺向埃及提供 74 亿欧元（81 亿美元）的一揽子援助，这是国际社会为提振埃及苦苦挣扎的经济所做的最新努力
item.description:
The European Union pledged a €7.4 billion ($8.1 billion) aid package for Egypt, the latest push by the international community to buoy its struggling economy https://t.co/NqgtKAKBP4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 南苏丹政府下令全国所有学校无限期停课，因为热浪可能导致气温升高至摄氏 45 度（华氏 113 度）。
item.description:
South Sudan’s government ordered all of the nation’s schools to close indefinitely because of a heat wave that could see temperatures rise to as high as 45C (113F) https://t.co/gSbCcC8Nbp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 汽车尾气排放的新限制、全球近一半经济体的关键利率决定，以及波音公司的困境会如何影响您的夏天。以下是周日简报
item.description:
New limits on auto emissions, key rate decisions for nearly half the global economy and how Boeing's woes could impact your summer. Here's your Sunday Briefing https://t.co/fMGcAnVSjj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚的碳排放量下降速度不足以实现其 2030 年气候目标

Australia’s carbon emissions aren’t dropping fast enough to reach its 2030 climate target https://t.co/syvjR9M1K6

item.title: 阿布扎比官员正在悄然策划一套新的福利方案，他们希望这将有助于推动该市跻身世界最大金融中心的行列
item.description:
Abu Dhabi officials are quietly orchestrating a fresh package of perks they hope will help propel the city up the ranks of the world’s biggest financial centers https://t.co/zlLxzUXYV2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 从卡夫亨氏到 Mondelez 等公司不再有理由继续提价
item.description:

item.title: .@kgreifeld的新ETF IQ时事通讯探讨了灰度公司的迷你GBTC计划，尽管最初的GBTC正面临数十亿美元的资金外流。
item.description:
.@kgreifeld's new ETF IQ newsletter explores Grayscale's plans for a mini-GBTC, even as the original one is seeing billions in outflows. https://t.co/KdaFHa8FxA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 食品杂货价格在四年内上涨了 25%，这是美国人对拜登经济不满意的一个重要原因
item.description:
Grocery prices are up 25% in four years and that's a big reason Americans remain unhappy with the Biden economy https://t.co/RwVfGYnZ4N

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 荷兰中央银行行长表示，下一届荷兰政府必须严格控制财政状况
item.description:
The next Dutch government must be rigorous in minding its finances, the country’s central bank chief says https://t.co/5VXDRNCWdT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员 Pablo Hernandez de Cos 表示，如果通胀如预期般继续放缓，他预计 6 月份将降息。
item.description:
ECB Governing Council member Pablo Hernandez de Cos says he expects rates to be cut in June if inflation continues to moderate as anticipated https://t.co/VDpY7b04Uh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 前沿市场已开始积极转变政策，本币债券投资者也开始从中获益。
item.description:
Frontier markets have embarked on aggressive policy shifts, and investors in local-currency bonds are starting to reap the benefits. https://t.co/JS6LyVFq1Z

item.title: 波音公司 2024 年灾难性的开局正波及航空公司，生产延误加剧了单通道喷气式飞机的短缺。
item.description:
Boeing’s disastrous start to 2024 is spilling over to airlines as production delays exacerbate a shortage of single-aisle jets https://t.co/ys3DO81E2C

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 这位 57 岁的对冲基金经理利用自己的科学知识，开发出一套交易巨灾债券的制胜法宝--由于气候变化和通货膨胀，巨灾债券市场正在蓬勃发展。阅读《大手笔》 ⬇️
item.description:
This 57-year-old hedge fund manager used his scientific knowledge to develop a winning formula for trading catastrophe bonds — a market that’s booming thanks to climate change and inflation.

Read The Big Take ⬇️ https://t.co/xux3mFAauI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 英国央行将就利率问题做出重大决定，并可能暂时按兵不动。以下是周日简报。
item.description:
The Bank of England has a big decision on interest rates and is likely to stand pat for now. Here's your Sunday briefing. https://t.co/5vf3gqzaIk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: Binance 首席执行官称，随着投资者将资金投入加密货币支持的交易所交易基金，比特币将突破 80,000 美元
item.description:
Bitcoin will top $80,000 as investors pour money into crypto-backed exchange-traded funds, Binance CEO says https://t.co/HjTaivSZXC

item.title: BAT 首席执行官表示，他不确定将 BAT 的上市地点迁出英国的好处是否如某些人所说的那样明显
item.description:
BAT CEO says he's unsure the benefit of moving BAT’s listing out of the UK would be as clear as some people have suggested https://t.co/bExSJf1See

item.title: European Green Transition Ltd. 计划在伦敦证券交易所 AIM 市场上市，为在欧洲进行更多 "绿色经济 "收购筹集资金。
item.description:

Iran unveiled a series of projects to raise its oil production in collaboration with domestic companies https://t.co/i95i9V0Pe2

item.title: 威尼斯的一家五星级酒店可能是其破产所有者 Signa Prime Selection AG 的债权人挽回部分损失的最佳机会之一
item.description:
A five-star hotel in Venice might just be one of the best chances for creditors of its insolvent owner, Signa Prime Selection AG, to recoup some of their losses https://t.co/rFSGeWX1kN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 海上风力涡轮机现在几乎有克莱斯勒大厦那么大，而足以安装这些涡轮机的船只却日益短缺
item.description:
Offshore wind turbines are now nearly the size of the Chrysler Building, and there’s a looming shortage of ships big enough to install them https://t.co/u3STqJK6JM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 据《非洲金融报》报道，矿业巨头必和必拓已在其耗资 17 亿澳元的 West Musgrave 镍矿项目中裁员约 25
item.description:
Mining giant BHP has cut about 25% of the workforce at its A$1.7 billion West Musgrave nickel project, the AFR reports https://t.co/0ne0ZMOp9f

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 印度的科技中心班加罗尔正在干旱中与缺水作斗争，随着夏季的临近，预计危机将进一步加剧。
item.description:
India’s tech hub of Bengaluru is struggling with water shortages amid a drought, with the crisis expected to escalate as summer approaches https://t.co/ZZcp9bMEzT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯总统选举进入最后一天，弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）有望赢得新一届总统任期，继续推进乌克兰战争并与西方对抗。
item.description:
Russia enters the final day of its presidential election with Vladimir Putin poised to clinch a new term to pursue his war in Ukraine and confrontation with the West https://t.co/5rPgHwRMfE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 维珍澳大利亚公司称，由于飞机制造商的问题，预计明年开始交付的部分波音新飞机已推迟到 2026 年交付。
item.description:
Virgin Australia said delivery of some new Boeing aircraft expected to begin next year has been delayed to 2026 because of problems at the planemaker https://t.co/vXWwmczCjZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 根据痛苦指数，里希-苏纳克政府正面临着导致保守党在 1997 年失败的经济困境
item.description:
According to the misery index, Rishi Sunak’s government is facing the levels of economic torment that led to the Conservative Party’s defeat in 1997 https://t.co/Jc5Hm93Q4h

A global rate-fest for central banks, Apple's AI conundrum and how to be a crypto expert: Sunday Asia Briefing https://t.co/0TW7Hzlylm

item.title: 调查显示，日本 4 万亿美元离岸基金将无视日本央行的首次加息。这对美国债券来说是个好消息
item.description:
Japan’s $4 trillion offshore funds will ignore first BOJ hike, survey shows. That's good news for US bonds https://t.co/OZ45nEn5iu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他将对中国公司在墨西哥生产的汽车征收 100%的关税，这比他之前表示要对美国边境以南生产的汽车征收的关税高出一倍。
item.description:
Donald Trump said he would hit cars made in Mexico by Chinese companies with a 100% tariff, double the levy he has previously said he would put on automobiles made south of the US border https://t.co/cKauOCBMd3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 16, 2024
